name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.reason for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: An explanation or justification for why this service is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` maps to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
